node.title: Pt 1-The Holy Spirit and Creation
node.description: "Anticipation" is a series that explores the Holy Spirit's role at major points in the salvation of man. Part 1 begins with the Spirit in Creation, and we realize that He really is a Spirit of anticipation. He often takes the subservient role in momentous times of our salvation's history, and this is no exception. In Genesis 1, working together with the Word, He actively anticipates Creation.
